author: macfarla
content: EIP-1898 - Geth and Besu implemented this a while ago but the EIP went to stagnant. EIP-1898 has moved back to draft https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5980 however it also depends on EIP-1474 so here's the PR to move it back to draft https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5986 and here's the PR adding relevant parts ie blockNumberOrTagOrHash to the spec https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/326 - feedback welcome!
